# includeAuthenticationExpirationDate

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether your app requests the expiration date of the user’s current authentication session.

## Declaration

```swift
var includeAuthenticationExpirationDate: Bool { get set }
```

## Requesting TV Provider Info

- **includeAccountProviderIdentifier**: A Boolean value that indicates whether your app requests the identifier of the account provider.
